thread.section_title: Amanda Seyfried becomes latest victim of photo hacking after website publishes leaked nude snaps – Metro
thread.title: Amanda Seyfried becomes latest victim of photo hacking after website publishes leaked nude snaps
thread.title_full: Amanda Seyfried becomes latest victim of photo hacking after website publishes leaked nude snaps

author: Caroline Westbrook
title: Amanda Seyfried becomes latest victim of photo hacking after website publishes leaked nude snaps
text:
Amanda Seyfried has reportedly fallen victim to photo hacking (Picture: Getty Images) Actress Amanda Seyfried has become the latest celebrity victim of photo hacking after reports that some very personal photos of her leaked online.
Ben Affleck spotted with Jennifer Garner for first time since completing rehab TMZ has reported that the Mean Girls star has called in the lawyers after the images appeared on a celebrity gossip website called Celeb Jihad – demanding that they be removed.
According to a legal letter published on the website, the ‘very private’ photos feature Amanda ‘in various states of nudity or in intimate moments with her former boyfriend’, and that they were ‘wrongfully obtained’ without the actress’ consent.
Amanda – who is expecting her first child with current partner Thomas Sadoski – is not the only actress who has been targeted in the latest leak.
The Mean Girls actress is currently expecting her first child (Picture: AP) News of the hacking comes after it was revealed that private photos of Emma Watson had also leaked online, showing the Beauty And The Beast star trying on outfits at a clothes fitting.
Reps for the actress confirmed that the photos had been leaked in the hack, but dened that nude photos had been involved following reports that they had.
More: Showbiz Mischa Barton admits 'worst fears' were realised over sex tape touting 
Jeremy McConnell being investigated by police over allegedly assaulting a woman 
John Legend tells partners to be more supportive after helping Chrissy Teigen with PND 
‘Photos from a clothes fitting Emma had with a stylist a couple of years ago have been stolen,’ her spokesman said.
Emma Watson is also taking legal action after photos of her were leaked (Picture: Getty Images) ‘They are not nude photographs. Lawyers have been instructed and we are not commenting further.’
TMZ has reported that other celebrities’ photos may have been hacked in the latest leak.
Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Amanda for comment. 
Like Metro Entertainment on Facebook for more stories on your news feed.
